synopsis.text: Known as the world's weakest hunter, Jinwoo Sung's life takes a dramatic turn when he stumbles upon a hidden, high-ranking dungeon while exploring a low-ranking one. Fatally injured and on the brink of death, Jinwoo encounters a mysterious quest window that offers him a chance to level up and gain unparalleled strength. As he accepts the quest and begins to grow stronger, Jinwoo discovers that he is the only one with this ability, and he becomes determined to uncover the secrets behind his newfound powers. With the weight of his mother's medical bills and his sister's tuition on his shoulders, Jinwoo must navigate the dangerous world of hunters and dungeons, where he is both feared and envied by those around him. Announced at the Crunchyroll Anime Expo 2022 Industry Panel, this anime follows Jinwoo's journey as he rises from the weakest hunter to a formidable force in a world connected to another dimension through the sudden appearance of gates.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
